bibl.title: Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007
bibl.note: Identification de fragments de papyrus conservés au Center for the Tebtynis Papyri (Berkeley): 1. Additions au traité médical relatif aux affections pulmonaires P.S.I. Inv. 3054 + P. Lund I, 6 (= Marganne 110) + P. Mil. Vogl. I, 16 (= Marganne 124) + P. Tebt. II, 677 (= Marganne 174) (= M.-P.3 2386; LDAB 244); - 2. Documents inédits de Tebtynis en cours d'étude (en part., des suppléments aux archives de Menchès, cômogrammate de Kerkéosiris).
bibl.seg: ANDORLINI Isabella, Old and New Greek Papyri from Tebtunis in the Bancroft Library of Berkeley: Work in Progress.

Sandra LIPPERT and Maren SCHENTULEIT (Edd.), Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007 (Wiesbaden, 2008) pp. 1-13, 4 figg.
